Text: Thanks for this. I was at the O2 gig last night when David Gilmour and Nick Mason joined Roger Waters on stage. I have the original vinyl, but this is good for the iPod.
I was @ the Manchester gig on sat and have a real connection to this album now

I've a question!
In the song: Another Brick in the Wall (Part 1) there's a beep between 2:32 and 2:34.
I really like the remastered quality, but this beep sort of ruins the experience...
Hey! Whats wrong with The Thin Ice??? What is that??
what's wrong with this? some songs louder than others? it's a piece of shit d/load don't bother.
Quickest download I've ever had. Perfect quality. Thank you very nicely.
What DJBIRCH said. Some tracks are louder than others. Other than that it's good.

If you're annoyed by the difference in sound volume, download the freeware MP3gain ( http://mp3gain.sourceforge.net/ ). It's really handy and fast to work with!

Otherwise great torrent, thanks alot! =)
